name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior NodeJS Engineer with expertise in **NodeJS**, **Typescript**, and advanced AI technologies including **LLMs**, **RAG**, and **Vector DBs**. Skilled in **Prompt Engineering**, utilizing frameworks like **MCP** and **Langchain**, while deploying applications using **Vercel AI SDK**. Proven track record of enhancing application performance and scalability in high-impact sectors such as healthcare and finance. Committed to crafting clean, efficient code and leveraging automation to drive significant improvements in user experience.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable applications using **NodeJS** and **Typescript**, enhancing system performance by 50% through optimal coding practices and efficient architecture.
Implemented AI-driven features utilizing **Langchain** and **LLMs**, increasing user engagement by 30% through personalized experience.
Leveraged **Vector DBs** for data storage and retrieval, reducing query response time by **40%**.
Designed intelligent prompt engineering mechanisms, improving data processing efficiency by **25%** and accuracy in understanding user intents.
Integrated **Vercel AI SDK** for seamless deployment of AI functionalities, reducing integration time by **50%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to transform business requirements into technical specifications, delivering projects **2 weeks** ahead of schedule.
Utilized Agile methodologies to streamline development processes, enhancing team productivity by **20%** and ensuring timely delivery of milestones.

● Developed scalable backend services using **Node.js** and **TypeScript**, enhancing system performance by 30%.
● Implemented AI-driven features utilizing **LLMs** and **RAG** strategies, increasing processing efficiency by 40%.
● Designed and integrated notification systems with **Kafka**, achieving a 98% timely notification rate for critical incidents.
● Leveraged **Vector DBs** for data storage, resulting in a 50% improvement in data retrieval times.
● Applied **Prompt Engineering** techniques to enhance user interactions, yielding a 25% increase in user satisfaction.
● Automated deployment pipelines using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a streamlined release process.
● Employed **Langchain** for integrated language processing workflows, optimizing system capabilities.
● Hosted applications on **Vercel AI SDK**, facilitating real-time updates and maintaining high availability.

Designed and developed backend services using **NodeJS** and **Typescript**, resulting in seamless integration with AI technologies and improved system performance.
Implemented AI-driven solutions using **LLMs** and **RAG**, achieving a **30%** increase in data processing efficiency.
Engineered robust data handling strategies with **Vector DBs**, ensuring **99%** data retrieval accuracy.
Performed **Prompt Engineering** to fine-tune AI model responses, enhancing user engagement by **25%**.
Deployed scalable applications using **Vercel AI SDK** and **MCP**, facilitating rapid development and delivery.
Utilized modern software development practices and tools to lead innovative projects, focusing on efficiency and scalability.
